name: Cannon Shot App
description:
Cannon Shot boasts of full 20 levels of shooting fun!

Simply aim and shoot at the right timing so that you can hit the moving target. Many of the blocks are moving as well, so the game is much more challenging and fun than it may look like!

If you miss all the 8 shots for a level, then you'll have to start from Level 0 again. You also have to clear all the 20 level within 500 seconds! Happy cannon shooting!
